resources.string: Thanks for using this app. Here you can see our privacy policy linked with this app.

All files are no longer hidden in your device. XML & HTML app helps you to handle all your files stored in your device, fetch all your files and display them in a list so that you can manage your files efficiently and easily.
In order to access all files, this app needs storage permission which is required to retrieve files from internal storage.
CDATA[Load all your HTML & XML files from your device storage in a single list so that you can easily scroll through it.
See your recently opened HTML & XML files here in app\'s recent folder
We care about your privacy and data security. We keep this app free by showing ads
Can we continue to use your data to tailor ads for you?
Our partner will collect data and use a unique identifier on your device to show you ads\nInline with new Data protection and Security Service, We need your consent to serve ads tailored for you.

To fully experience this app you need to allow some permissions which is required for app to work efficiently. In order to fetch, modify or delete files app needs access to device\'s information. Don\'t worry the information collected will be kept private.
App needs external storage permissions to fetch all files from your device\'s storage and to display them in a single list so that you can view, delete or share files by just a single click..
For Further details about how this app handles these permissions, please visit the privacy policy at below link.
